field_provus_body.value:
At the heart of our commitment to animal welfare, the Meridian County Adoption Shelter provides a safe haven for furry friends in need of loving homes. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to match each pet with a caring family, ensuring a brighter future for both animals and adopters. Explore our shelter, meet the adorable companions awaiting adoption, and make a difference by giving a forever home to a deserving pet.

 

Animal Shelter


233 Wayne Avenue


Summersville, TN 25784
